text: Ningen wa saiyaku ni aeba omoni inori, kaigo shite kare ni kaeru. Daga, onkei ga kare no omoto kara sadzuke rareru to,-saki ni inotta koto o wasurete, arra ni doisha o haishi, kare no michi kara (hitobito o) mayowa seru. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata wa, tsukanoma no fushinjin (no seikatsu) o kyoraku suruga yoi. Hontoni anata wa, hi goku no nakamadearu
